Class RegistrationValidator

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    The RegistrationValidator class is responsible for validating the data when add new user.

      • checkDuplicateEmail

        public static boolean checkDuplicateEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Checks for identical email of user in the database
        Parameters:
        email - email which checked
        Returns:
        It returns true if the database is a user with the same email and false otherwise

      • checkDuplicateLogin

        public static boolean checkDuplicateLogin(java.lang.String login)
        Checks for identical login of user in the database
        Parameters:
        login - login which checked
        Returns:
        It returns true if the database is a user with the same login and false otherwise

      • checkIdentityPasswords

        public static boolean checkIdentityPasswords(java.lang.String password,
                                             java.lang.String confirmPassword)
        Checks for identical input passwords
        Parameters:
        password - password with the first field in the form of INPUT
        confirmPassword - password with the second field in the form of INPUT
        Returns:
        true if password is equal and false otherwise
